cmput301w14t13.project.models
Class ServerProxy

java.lang.Object
  cmput301w14t13.project.models.ServerProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsyncProcess
public class ServerProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements AsyncProcess

This class saves Comments and Topics Locally on the users phone It is used to cache recently viewed Topics and comments and to save Favorite Topics and Comments

Author:
mjnichol

getData

public CommentTreeElement getData(java.lang.String key)

Parameters:
key - A unique ID associated with a CommentTreeElement
Returns:
CommentTreeElement A single CommentTreeElement

getTopicOfFavouriteComment

public CommentTreeElement getTopicOfFavouriteComment(CommentTreeElement key)
This method is called when a user clicks a comment that they have saved as a favourite. It will then display the Topic along with the single comment that they have marked as a favourite. The comment will be displayed as well as all of its replies..

Parameters:
key - The comment that we want to see in the context of the topic it was made within.
Returns:

public void clearFavourites()

getFavouritesAsArrayList

public java.util.ArrayList<CommentTreeElement> getFavouritesAsArrayList()

save

public void save()
          throws java.io.IOException
Saves files locally using Gson to convert Java objects to json format and write those json strings into the appropriate file in the device. Used to save comments,favorites, and usernames locally onto the device when a user wishes to access them offline, or just to have a directory of them for easy reference.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

loadUsernames

public void loadUsernames()
                   throws java.io.IOException
Reads json strings from a specified filepath that representing comments,favorites, and usernames then loads them into appropriate hashmaps Used when user wants to view locally saved content

Throws:
java.io.IOException

initializePrefs

public void initializePrefs(Context context)
Sets up the preferences to prepare for saving and loading of usernames. This is only initialized in SelectUsernameController since that is where the usernames are managed

Parameters:
context - The context of SelectUsernameController
